Introducing a new 24/7 best of Red Bull TV linear experience and discover more premium content through curated channels updated daily. Welcome to an all new Red Bull TV app built from the ground up!

- Now available for Apple Watch (watchOS 3+)
- Interactive TV schedule allows you to play upcoming content on demand
- Improved navigation
- Search suggestions pop up as you type
- Improved player controls allow you to preview video as you scroll along the timeline
- Tap video to play or pause
- Convenient tune-in notifications for each live event stop
- Improvements & fixes for iOS 10
- Easier links to provide feedback

Love Red Bull TV? Rate the app 5 stars and tell your friends!

Sign in or create a Red Bull account to enjoy a more personalized experience:
- Mark films, movies, shows and events as "favorite" and access them from your Account screen.
- You can now download select shows, movies, and clips to watch offline at a later time.

Enjoy Red Bull Rampage like never before with an Augmented Reality experience:
- Explore a photorealistic 3-dimensional model of the mountain, zooming in and moving around the course with the touch of your fingertips.
- Watch live 360-degree cameras placed in key locations around the course during the live broadcast, providing you with real-time, unprecedented access to never before seen angles and the ability to look in any direction by simply rotating your phone.
- Visit multiple "points of interest" located across the virtual mountain that lets you access exclusive content including 360 behind-the-scenes footage.
- Don't miss a second of the action - a live in-app "billboard" will feature the livestream broadcast; so when you're exploring all the cool features of the mountain, you won't miss any downhill goodness.
- Tap on each riders' name to see their run mapped to their exact line down the mountain.

Access the AR experience by tapping on the AR button located at the top-left corner of the Discover screen.

For its 25th anniversary, experience Hare Scramble in an informative and entertaining way through augmented reality.

- Explore a photorealistic 3-dimensional model of the Erzbergrodeo mountain, zooming in and moving around the course with the touch of your fingertips.
- Place the mountain anywhere on a flat surface, such as your living room table.
- Watch 360° action & explanation videos of some of the hot spots of the track.
- Try out to tackle the most challenging areas of the race in augmented reality.

Access the AR experience by tapping on the AR button located at the top-left corner of the Home screen.

Red Bull Rampage is back and the Augmented Reality experience is better than ever:
- New user interface for quick access to rider bios and rider routes.
- Updated 3-dimensional model of the mountain with added details.
- A “year selector” is now available, giving you access to the previous year’s rider routes and “points of interests” (POIs).
- Improved POIs now support 2D and 360 photo galleries. Keep an eye out for new POIs before, during, and after the event.
